title: Death Penalty System
content: In Adrullan, death results in a soul tether mechanic and light XP loss (5%). No corpse runs required. Players respawn at nearest shrine with temporary stat debuff for 2 minutes. This system encourages careful play while avoiding harsh penalties.

title: Combat System Overview
content: Adrullan features action-based combat with skill combinations, dodging, and timing mechanics. Players can chain abilities for powerful combos. There's no auto-attack - all actions require player input. Combat is designed to be skill-based rather than gear-dependent.

title: Character Progression System
content: Characters progress through skill trees rather than traditional levels. Players earn skill points by using abilities and completing content. There are no class restrictions - players can learn any skill they want, creating unique builds.
